overview.name: Shir Zabolotny
overview.subtitle: Frontend developer who weaves together
overview.quote: To me, a website is more than code or visuals - it should tell **your brand's story** and **turn visitors into believers** in what you do.
overview.cta: Let's create something that makes you unique and helps your business grow

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I've shaped my skills at top tech companies, with an M.Sc. in Information Systems.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I blend technical precision with design intuition, creating reliable and functional solutions, while prioritizing work done correctly and thoroughly
aboutMe.paragraph3: I bring an artist's eye to every project - turning color, composition, and hierarchy into interfaces that feel intuitive.
